channel.description: Recent content in cmd on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] [Python] Start a batch file from Python and pass variables.
item.description: # What is a batch file? This is a file that describes a series of commands executed on Windows. There are two types of batch files with the extension “.bat” and “.cmd”, but the operation is basically the same. If you would like to know more about this difference, please refer to the following articles. What is .cmd (extension) Why do you need this feature? It was difficult to learn batch commands simply.
